author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
title: The top doctor on the President's coronavirus team says he doesn't understand why every state hasn't issued the order
description: The nation's top infectious disease expert said Thursday he doesn't understand why every state hasn't issued stay-at-home orders as novel coronavirus cases continue to surge across the US.
content:
Washington (CNN)The nation's top infectious disease expert said Thursday he doesn't understand why every state hasn't issued stay-at-home orders as novel coronavirus cases continue to surge across the US.
"I don't understand why that's not happening," Dr. An… [+2513 chars]
